select ORDER_IDX, UC_IDX, USER_IDX, o.order_date, PRD_IDX, PAYMENT_AMOUNT, o.state, ORDER_CNT, SAVE_MONEY, p.name, p.brand, po_name, d.dt_idx from "ORDER" o inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX)
user_idx = #{userIdx} and o.dt_idx=d.dt_idx
and o.state is not null
and o.STATE = #{state}
and o.order_date between TO_DATE(#{fromDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
order by o.order_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW(RV_IDX,USER_IDX,PRD_IDX,ORDER_IDX,DT_IDX,RATING,RV_CONTENT,TYPE) values(SC_RV_IDX.nextval, #{userIdx}, (select prd_idx from "ORDER" o join prd_detail d using(prd_idx) where order_idx = 10006 and o.dt_idx=d.dt_idx) ,#{orderIdx}, (select dt_idx from "ORDER" where order_idx=#{orderIdx}) ,#{rating},#{rvContent},#{type})
mapper.select:
select ORDER_IDX, USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, ORDER_DATE, o.STATE, ORDER_CNT, UPDATE_DATE,IS_REVIEW, p.name, p.brand, d.po_name, d.dt_idx, o.order_date from "ORDER" o inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX)

select ORDER_IDX, USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, o.state, ORDER_CNT, p.name, p.brand, po_name,d.dt_idx from "ORDER" o inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where user_idx = #{userIdx} and o.state = 4 and o.order_idx = #{orderIdx} and o.dt_idx=d.dt_idx

select r.RV_IDX, r.USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, r.ORDER_IDX, r.STATE, r.RATING, r.TYPE, r.RECOMMAND, r.REG_DATE, RV_CONTENT, p.name, p.brand, d.po_name, d.dt_idx from REVIEW r inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) inner join "ORDER" o USING(PRD_IDX)
r.USER_IDX = #{userIdx} and o.dt_idx = d.dt_idx
and r.state is not null
and r.STATE = #{state}
order by reg_date desc

select SH_IDX, USER_IDX, s.STATE, s.TYPE, s.AMOUNT, s.REG_DATE, PRD_IDX, p.NAME,o.dt_idx, o.order_idx from SAVE_HISTORY s inner join "ORDER" o USING(USER_IDX) inner join product p using(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) where user_idx = #{userIdx} and o.dt_idx=d.dt_idx and o.order_idx=s.order_idx and s.state=#{state} order by s.reg_date desc

select COUPON_IDX, c.NAME, c.SALE_PER, c.IS_DEL, u.USER_IDX, u.reg_date, u.UC_IDX, u.EXP_DATE from user_coupon u inner join coupon c USING(COUPON_IDX) where u.user_idx = #{userIdx} and u.exp_date > sysdate
select USER_IDX, EMAIL, NICKNAME,GRADE, USER_ID, ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, SAVEMONEY,IS_LEAVE ,USER_NAME, ORDER_IDX from "USER" u inner join "ORDER" o USING(USER_IDX) where USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

select QNA_IDX, q.USER_IDX, PRD_IDX, q.ORDER_IDX, q.TITLE, q.CONTEXT, q.TYPE, q.REG_DATE, IS_ANSWER, AW_CONTEXT, AW_REG_DATE, p.name, p.brand, d.po_name,o.dt_idx from QNA q inner join product p USING(PRD_IDX) inner join prd_detail d USING(PRD_IDX) inner join "ORDER" o using(PRD_IDX)
q.USER_IDX = #{userIdx} and o.dt_idx=d.dt_idx and q.order_idx = o.order_idx
and q.REG_DATE between TO_DATE(#{fromDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
order by q.reg_date desc
